meta.name: numpy
meta.narrative: NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing in Python, with institutional backing from NumFOCUS and contributions from universities and research labs worldwide. It has extremely high download volumes, frequent releases (NumPy 2.3.5 released Nov 2025), and a large active contributor base. This represents the gold standard of community-maintained open source.

expected.notes: Top-tier health across all components. Institutional backing, huge contributor base, very frequent releases, massive adoption. Should score 85+ alongside React.
